meanings.definition: A tall wading bird with a long neck, legs, and pink or reddish plumage.
meanings.sent1: The flamingoes gracefully waded in the shallow water.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of flamingoes at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The flamingoes seemed to have a pink party by the lake.
meanings.sent4: Her elegance was like that of a flamingo, standing tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the flamingoes against the sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: She painted her room in flamingoes to create a warm atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The sunset painted the sky in beautiful flamingoes.
meanings.sent3: The flamingoes of the sunset made the whole sky blush.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks turned flamingoes when she was embarrassed.
meanings.sent5: The flamingoes of the sunrise lit up the horizon.
